#### 1. **LVDCS: Minimising Doubts in Distance Learning**
- Lecture Video Doubt Clarification System is an interactive, real-time user query response system for e-learning videos utilizing Transformers, LLMs and CV
- Visual-language task for natural interaction with videos, aiming to increase the understanding of the lecture video content
- With the help of lecture videos and their corresponding transcripts, doubt clarification is performed, taking into consideration domain knowledge

#### 2. **NSE Market Data Analysis**
- Developed visualisation charts and generated buy/sell signals for real time NSE market data from Moneycontrol
- Open Interest of Calls and Puts were analyzed using a Stacked Grouped Bar Chart using PyPlot
- This method of visualisation is not available with any established market information providers like Opstra,
DefineEdge and Sensibull (Zerodha)
- Specific Data related to Index (Nifty / Nifty Bank) namely LTP, VWAP, Put Call Ratio (PCR), Change in PCR, Open interest (OI) and Change in OI were captured every 5 mins to generate Buy / Sell signals
